mapper.sql: object_id AS "objectId" , object_code AS "objectCode" , object_name AS "objectName" , object_comment AS "objectComment" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_date AS "deleteDate" , id AS "id" , spell_abbr AS "spellAbbr" , price AS "price" , store_code AS "storeCode" , order_number AS "orderNumber" , user_code AS "userCode" , mobile_number AS "mobileNumber" , exec_times AS "execTimes" , max_exec_times AS "maxExecTimes" , last_exec_err_code AS "lastExecErrCode" , last_exec_err_msg AS "lastExecErrMsg" , last_exec_date AS "lastExecDate" , schedule_exec_date AS "scheduleExecDate"

sql.set: object_id = #{objectId}, object_code = #{objectCode}, object_name = #{objectName}, object_comment = #{objectComment}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_date = #{deleteDate}, id = #{id}, spell_abbr = #{spellAbbr}, price = #{price}, store_code = #{storeCode}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, user_code = #{userCode}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, exec_times = #{execTimes}, max_exec_times = #{maxExecTimes}, last_exec_err_code = #{lastExecErrCode}, last_exec_err_msg = #{lastExecErrMsg}, last_exec_date = #{lastExecDate}, schedule_exec_date = #{scheduleExecDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dic_model ( object_id, object_code, object_name, object_comment, create_date, update_date, delete_date, id, spell_abbr, price, store_code, order_number, user_code, mobile_number, exec_times, max_exec_times, last_exec_err_code, last_exec_err_msg, last_exec_date, schedule_exec_date ) VALUES ( #{objectId}, #{objectCode}, #{objectName}, #{objectComment}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteDate}, #{id}, #{spellAbbr}, #{price}, #{storeCode}, #{orderNumber}, #{userCode}, #{mobileNumber}, #{execTimes}, #{maxExecTimes}, #{lastExecErrCode}, #{lastExecErrMsg}, #{lastExecDate}, #{scheduleExecDate} )
